game.title: Ancient Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple
game.description: In a remote jungle, there is a mysterious lost temple that is said to hold a powerful artifact from ancient times. You have been tasked with retrieving this artifact and bringing it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: Ancient artifact grants the power of immortality

task.objective: Locate the entrance of the lost temple
task.description: The entrance to the lost temple is hidden deep within the jungle. Look for clues and signs to guide you.
